title: SC EP:306 Utah Sasquatch
itunes:title: SC EP:306 Utah Sasquatch
description:
Tonight I will be speaking to Nathan Reo. Nathan did not believe that Sasquatch was real and wanted to prove to his nephew that there was nothing to the subject of Sasquatch. He soon found out that it is VERY real.

Nathan will be sharing his encounters in Utah with us, and how he went from a skeptic to KNOWING that these creatures are out there. Join me as I welcome Nathan Reo to the show.
